name: List-item UI Component
description:
There are two ways you can build a scalable list-item component for UI design that allows for fast iterative explorations when you are in the design-weeds.

The first approach relies on creating a Figma component with hidden layers â€” this works because it's a component, and you get all of the benefits of using components.

The second approach uses auto-layout, but, doesn't use a component architecture and so ends up being a more manual "unscalable" process. Going with this approach provides the benefits of using auto-layout.

What I'd love to see are some options to set "min-width, min-height, max-width, and max-height" as some more nuanced options.
